version_description: Updated icon and keywords

We've made changes to the start screen to provide more direct visibility to your member ID, current reward balance, and the closest gas station. For enhanced security and convenience, Touch ID has been incorporated. If you've set it up on your phone, then all you need is your thumb to login. Also, you'll find new ways to easily share your experiences, especially your earned and redeemed rewards. Finally, we've made it more convenient to get to your messages when you receive a push notification. Be sure to opt in to get the best information on how to maximize your rewards.

In this release, improvements were made to many core functions including the following:
- Map zoom default adjusted so it's easier to see places to earn or redeem on the map
- Push message management for efficient access to new offers and program updates
- Visa card linking modifications to ensure easier card linking
- Preference management for new location announcements to help ensure you are able to redeem your rewards and to find great ways to earn at Shell stations
And, as always, we fixed a few bugs.

In this release we’ve focused on fine-tuning our code base and have eliminated several bugs.

A time stamp was also added to all fuel prices indicating when we received the price shown. The price shown in the app is the lowest price at the station across all grades. Please note that prices occasionally change throughout the day, and the actual price at the pump may vary.

We continued adding improvements into the underlying code base of the app to enhance overall performance and speed.

In addition, digital card will linger a bit longer upon start up and the nearest fuel station will be easier to read due to increased opacity of the card background.

Lastly, we've added more choice to the types of notifications you want to receive. Check out your preferences to manage location alerts for expiring rewards and in-store offers.
This release includes an improved registration experience for individuals who may have a reward code available.

Fuel grades and prices by grade are now available in the app. In addition, members can order a Fuel Rewards card, add an optional security PIN to ALT ID, more easily manage alerts, and use force touch to quickly view key account data. There are also a few bug fixes and minor UI adjustments. There is so much in this release that an upgrade is required.

Fuel Grades and Prices
We are now providing fuel grades and prices at participating stations. Only available grades will display, and pricing is based on data received within the past 24 hours. If no price is received in that time frame, the price will show as N/A (not available).

Order Card
If you prefer to use plastic and need a Fuel Rewards card, you can order one in the manage cards section.

Alt ID Update
For consistency across our network, Member ID has been renamed ALT ID. It is now directly tied to your mobile number, making it easier to set up and remember.

Optional Security Pin
For those who would like increased security, members may now add an optional 4-digit pin to the Alt ID.

Force Touch
By tapping hard on the Fuel Rewards app icon, a new menu will emerge containing your Alt ID, reward balance, and a link to the nearest station. This feature is available on iPhone 6S or later.

Shell eReceipts
Shell eReceipts provide full details on recent transactions at certain Shell stations. Opt-in or out of eReceipts in the preference center. Not all Shell stations provide eReceipts.

Expiring Rewards and In-Store Offer Notifications
In the preference center, control if you want to receive push notifications to alert you of expiring rewards or offers inside select stations. This requires location services to be always on. You can manage your device’s settings under Location Services.

- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes
- Support for iOS 10

- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes
We improved your ability to communicate with our support team and implemented a number of bug fixes.

All members receive instant Gold Status for 6 months and will save at least 5¢/gal on up to 20 gallons per fill-up at participating Shell stations.
View your status on your digital card. Find stations on the map. Limited to participating Shell stations.
Track your status and progress toward Gold Status.
Bug fixes and performance improvements

The Fuel Rewards app has a new look, designed to make saving at Shell easier than ever. With rewards front and center, see what you’ve earned, track rewards in progress, and save even more when you shop in-store at Shell.

• Access exclusive limited-time offers
• Discover new ways to earn rewards
• See a breakdown of what you’ve earned
• Find nearby Shell stations, fuel prices, and in-store offers
• Track your Gold Status and rewards in progress

• Refreshed offer tile design focused on rewards for easy scanning
• New category for earning rewards on food and beverages at participating Shell stations. See offer details for nearby locations.
Fixed some bugs and improved app performance

New feature added: Fill up faster with a single swipe of your linked credit card with Link & Save™. Simply opt in via the app (menu icon > my account > manage cards) and use your linked card to pay for fuel and redeem your rewards at participating Shell stations. Don’t wait for the prompt screens at the pump – skip ahead with Link & Save™!
User Interface improvements.
Support for iPhone X display and code improvements

The Fuel Rewards app has a new look, designed to make saving at Shell easier than ever. With rewards front and center, see what you’ve earned, track rewards in progress, and save even more when you shop in-store at Shell.

• Access exclusive limited-time offers
• Discover new ways to earn rewards
• See a breakdown of what you’ve earned
• Find nearby Shell stations, fuel prices, and in-store offers
• Track your Gold Status and rewards in progress
Bug fixes and performance improvements

• Faster load speed
• Improved push notification experience
• Enhanced stations map with fuel grade selection
